meanings.definition: To go beyond in quantity, degree, or extent.
meanings.sent1: The number of apples exceeded the number of oranges.
meanings.sent2: She always exceeds the speed limit when driving.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to exceed the height of the fence but failed comically.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his work exceeds all expectations.
meanings.sent5: The excitement in the room exceeded all previous levels.

meanings.definition: To surpass in achievement or quality.
meanings.sent1: Her artwork always exceeds everyone else's in the class.
meanings.sent2: The team's performance exceeded their coach's expectations.
meanings.sent3: The cake's deliciousness exceeded all known limits.
meanings.sent4: His kindness towards others exceeds that of anyone I know.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the sunset exceeded anything I had ever seen before.
